name: XWUI Drawer Component
description: Drawer (side sheet) component that slides in from edges of the screen. Supports placement from all four sides (left, right, top, bottom), various sizes, backdrop mask, and close behaviors. Useful for navigation, settings, and secondary content.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

placement.description: Side from which the drawer slides in

closeOnBackdrop.description: Whether clicking the backdrop closes the drawer

closeOnEscape.description: Whether pressing Escape closes the drawer

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the drawer

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

title.description: Title text for the drawer header

content.description: Content element or HTML string for the drawer body
